text:
Champions League
OL - Benfica: Memphis Depay displays its goals!
Scorer and savior of Olympique Lyonnais against Toulouse (2-3), Memphis Depay affirmed in press conference to want to be an important player of the team.
04 Nov 2019, 17:00 by Charlie Creteur



Olympique Lyonnais was full of confidence before facing for the 2nd time in the Champions League Benfica! After their defeat in Lisbon (2-1), Rudi Garcia's players went on to win 2 consecutive wins against Metz (2-0) and Toulouse (2-3). Successes acquired with difficulty and thanks to Moussa Demb√©l√© and especially Memphis Depay. "It was very important to win the last two games," said the Dutchman in a press conference. "You have to keep the confidence, the most important thing is to keep that confidence, we have to get a good result tomorrow."







Memphis is aiming for 70 goals!




Memphis Depay comforting Anthony Lopes + 9 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

The latter has also returned to his recent performances and those of Anthony Lopes in difficulty. "I'm trying to do better for the team," he continued. "I am a player who wants to be decisive in every game Anthony Lopes is very professional, he has a lot of experience, he has saved us so much and when he is well, the team is doing well." If the former Manchester United boarder scores tomorrow, he will score 50 goals with OL. "I always want to do more, I hope to reach 60 and 70 goals very quickly".
